snippet: Chinese officials tried to allay concerns on Sunday that the country was allowing its banking system to grow at a reckless pace as a way to sustain short-term economic growth.
abstract: China's top banking regulators and chairmen of its four largest banks hold news conference to allay concerns that country is allowing its banking system to grow at  reckless pace as way to sustain short-term economic growth; loans in China have been climbing steeply over four years as share of economy, prompting foreign bank analysts to question sustainability of country's economic model.
lead_paragraph: Chinese officials tried to allay concerns on Sunday that the country was allowing its banking system to grow at a reckless pace as a way to sustain short-term economic growth.

headline.seo: China’s Banking Leaders Seek to Calm Concerns Over Lending
headline.main: China’s Banking Leaders Seek to Calm Concerns Over Loan Quality
headline.print_headline: China Tackles Concerns Over Health of Banks
